scripts.create-tables: cd backend && dotnet ef migrations add InitialCreate && dotnet ef database update
scripts.update-tables: cd backend && dotnet ef database update
scripts.update-core: cp -r frontend/src/app/components React-Core-Components && cp -r frontend/src/app/base React-Core-Components && cp -r frontend/src/app/api React-Core-Components && cp -r frontend/src/app/pages React-Core-Components && cp -r frontend/src/app/redux React-Core-Components && cp frontend/src/app/component.css React-Core-Components
scripts.update-frontend: cp -r React-Core-Components/api frontend/src/app && cp -r React-Core-Components/base frontend/src/app && cp -r React-Core-Components/components frontend/src/app && cp -r React-Core-Components/pages frontend/src/app/client-pages && cp -r React-Core-Components/redux frontend/src/app && cp React-Core-Components/component.css frontend/src/app
